panels.title: Memory Page Faults
panels.description: Number of major page faults that occurred inside a pod

panels.title: Network Errors
panels.description: Number of Network IO errors in the Pod

panels.title: Network IO/s
panels.description: Total Network bytes IO/s by the Pod

panels.title: Containers in Pod
panels.description: Total number of containers in the Pod

panels.title: Pod CPU Request Utilization
panels.description: Represents how much CPU a pod is using compared to its requested CPU

panels.title: Pod CPU Limit Utilization
panels.description: Represents how much CPU a Pod is using compared to its CPU limit

panels.title: Pod Memory Request Utilization
panels.description: Represents how much Memory a pod is using compared to its requested Memory

panels.title: Pod Memory Limit Utilization
panels.description: Represents how much Memory a Pod is using compared to its Memory limit
